title: Increased lag on both NA and EUW
body: I live in the UK and play on EUW alone and on NA, with my friends. I stopped playing for about a month and a half , since I've come back my ping went from a stable 100-125 ping on NA to 150-250 ping with noticeable lag jumps. Even worse is I'm lagging on EUW too, I used to have 20 ping now I get 50-70ping, I can barely catch Draven's axes now.

replies.body:
You're gonna have a bad time if you can't catch Draven's axes!

With your ping hovering that high, it sounds like your network is having a hard time keeping a stable connection throughout the whole game. Take a look at our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways you can help improve your network's connection to our game servers.

Hit me back up if you have any questions.
